title: Good solo carry champ
body: i'm finding it impossible to carry games on my own using my main few champions, so I'd appreciate it if anybody knew other picks that can carry a game on their own?

replies.body: Zed, Talon, Essentially anything that has high damage high mobility. KhaZix and Yi also come to mind.

At that Elo, basically anyone who doesn't get one shot and ideally has built in sustain or buys sustain items.  You can abuse Mord, Garen, Tryndamere, Teemo, Mundo, Jax.  All of those can be played either top or jungle (maybe not mord).  Teemo shrooms are strong, Garen requires a little patience but scales very well, Tryndamere, Mundo and Mord are pretty braindead. Jax takes a little practice, but isn't too hard.  Basically, you want to bait the enemy into trying to kill you (not get blown up), then kill them.  Or if massively ahead just take everything on the map and if they contest, kill them.

If you must play squishys, I suggest rushing zhonya's for the bait and outplay. It is very useful.

vlad, pyke, any good jungler especially kha'zix, conqueror garen
ryze is really strong but dunno if he can 1v9, the other ones i listed can
